name: KANO
description:
ARCADE ACTION IN YOUR POCKET!

KANO is erupting, match the colors to stop the lava for as long as possible. Skilful throws, spins, catches and tilts will help you get that best score and beat your friends.

GLITCHERS took the classic arcade machine and brought it into the smartphone era with a modern twist.

PREMIUM MODES

KANO is a free to play game, but designed so that you can buy the unlimited experience for a one off cost, the best of both worlds. Premium gives you:

UNLIMITED LIVES
Never worry about using lives again, play as much as you want, whenever you feel like it.

COOL HATS
Characters wear hats including Fez, Viking, Headband & Crown

TURBO MODE
Turbo mode is the fastest, most hectic version of KANO. Double points, double speed and it’s own pro-leaderboard for turbo players.

GET YOUR SPIN ON!
